text.jpText:
ナリタタイシンと過ごす
3年目の『夏合宿』が始まった！
text.enText:
The third annual "Summer Camp" with 
Narita Taishin has begun!

text.jpText:
彼女のもとには
昨年、共に合宿を過ごしたウマ娘が
トレーニングや遊びの誘いに訪れていた。
text.enText:
She was visited by the Uma girls who had 
spent the last year at the camp with her, 
inviting her to train and play with them.

text.jpText:
ナリタタイシンは若干、戸惑いつつも
嫌がっているわけではない様子――
text.enText:
Narita Taishin was a little confused, 
but she didn't seem to mind.

text.jpText:
どうやら、
今年の『夏合宿』は楽しいものになりそうだ。
text.enText:
It looks like this year's "summer 
camp" will be a fun one.
